text: The men's team pursuit at the 2017 Asian Winter Games was held on 22 February 2017 in Obihiro, Japan. ==Schedule== All times are Japan Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Wednesday, 22 February 2017 || 15:55 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} == Records == ==Results== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=40|Pair !width=250|Team !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |- | || 2 || align=left| Joo Hyong-jun Kim Min-seok Lee Seung-hoon||3:44.32|| |- | || 1 || align=left| Shota Nakamura Shane Williamson Ryosuke Tsuchiya||3:45.93|| |- | || 2 || align=left| Dmitriy Babenko Denis Kuzin Fyodor Mezentsev||3:59.37|| |- | 4 || 1 || align=left| Liu Yiming Rehanbai Talabuhan Zhu Jiafan||4:03.20|| |} ==References== ==External links== *Results Men team pursuit
title: Speed skating at the 2017 Asian Winter Games – Men's team pursuit
